SQL.SQLRaw: SELECT timetable_id, vehicle_id, route.route_code route_code, runningno running_no, duty_no duty_no, trip_no trip_no, operator_code operator_code, trip_status trip_status, event_code event_code, operation_date day, next_duty next_duty, next_duty_time next_duty_time, start_time start_time, service_code service_code, pub_ttb_id pub_ttb_id, scheduled_start scheduled_start, active_status active_status, act_start act_start, act_veh act_veh, EXTEND(journey_to, HOUR TO SECOND) end_time, alloc_vehcode alloc_vehcode, mod_type mod_type, arc_sched arc_sched, act_sched act_sched, journey_from journey_from, mod_status mod_status, operation_date operation_date, snapshot_board_status.operator_id operator_id, over_midnight over_midnight, diversion diversion, lateness lateness, row_changed, current_status row_status FROM snapshot_board_status JOIN route_visibility route ON route.route_id = snapshot_board_status.route_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND usernm = USER AND current_status IN ( 'OK', 'DELETED' ) [ AND operation_date {date} ] [ AND snapshot_board_status.route_id IN ( {route} ) ] [ AND snapshot_board_status.operator_id IN ( {operator} ) ] [ AND trip_no IN ( {trip_no} ) ] [ AND runningno IN ( {runningno} ) ] [ AND vehicle_id IN ( {vehicle} ) ] [ AND duty_no IN ( {duty} ) ] [ AND start_time BETWEEN {fromtime} AND {totime} ] [ AND ( {showCurrent} = '1' and act_start IN ( 'CURRENT', 'CURLATE', 'CUREARLY' ) ) ] [ AND ( row_changed > {since} ) ] AND ( [ {since} != "" OR ] current_status = "OK" ) ORDER BY operator_code ASC, scheduled_start ASC

Assignment.Expression: 'Tooltips=Vehicle Code;Lateness Band;Route,Type=Icon,HotspotX=32,HotspotY=42,KeyField=Key,Filters=Route;Vehicle Code;Lateness Band;Trip Type;Trip Status,RenderType=Despatcher,RenderElements=Operator Code;Route;Vehicle Code;Trip Type;Trip Status;Lateness,Metric=Lateness,PosColor=#ff0000,Negcolor=#0000ff,ZeroColor=#00ff00,MetricRangeLower=-300,MetricRangeUpper=300'

Query.WhereSql: AND operator.operator_id = route.operator_id AND usernm = USER
AND 1 = 1 AND publish_tt.service_id = service.service_id AND service.route_id = route.route_id
AND 1 = 1 AND 1 = 1 AND ( vehicle.operator_id = cent_user.operator_id OR cent_user.operator_id IS NULL ) AND cent_user.usernm = USER
